input.sentences: our group rents bikes no matter where we vacation .
we covered a lot of ground and took tons photos .
so many ships passed by this island port . this area is not accessible by car .
we stopped here for a rest | we had traveled many miles .
back at the hotel | we took some photos while discussing dinner plans .
output.sentences: No matter where the friends vacation the plans were to stay in a hotel that rents bikes and capture photos on a tour.
They took tons of photos at a lot of scenic stops.
One stop in particular was at a port where ships passed as they waited.
After they traveled many miles they stopped to rest at a park.
Their plans to take photos and stay at a local hotel went perfectly.
